summary.para: Utility functions for working with JSON data.

member.name: M:UnityEngine.JsonUtility.FromJson(System.String)

summary.para: Create an object from its JSON representation.

member.param: The JSON representation of the object.

member.name: M:UnityEngine.JsonUtility.FromJson(System.String,System.Type)

summary.para: Create an object from its JSON representation.

member.param: The JSON representation of the object.
The type of object represented by the Json.

member.name: M:UnityEngine.JsonUtility.FromJsonOverwrite(System.String,System.Object)

summary.para: Overwrite data in an object by reading from its JSON representation.

member.param: The JSON representation of the object.
The object that should be overwritten.

member.name: M:UnityEngine.JsonUtility.ToJson(System.Object)

summary.para: Generate a JSON representation of the public fields of an object.

member.param: The object to convert to JSON form.
If true, format the output for readability. If false, format the output for minimum size. Default is false.

returns.para: The object's data in JSON format.

member.name: M:UnityEngine.JsonUtility.ToJson(System.Object,System.Boolean)

summary.para: Generate a JSON representation of the public fields of an object.

member.param: The object to convert to JSON form.
If true, format the output for readability. If false, format the output for minimum size. Default is false.

returns.para: The object's data in JSON format.
